description: The function is vulnerable to several types of attacks. It does not properly validate user input (CWE-20), which can lead to SQL Injection (CWE-89) if the input is used in a SQL query. It also does not properly sanitize user input (CWE-79), which can lead to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks if the input is displayed on a webpage. Finally, it does not implement any CSRF protections (CWE-352), which can allow an attacker to trick a user into performing actions they did not intend to.
